title: Gotham Knights Release Date Revealed - Kinda Funny Games Daily 03.09.22
description:
Janet and Tim join forces to talk about Gotham Knights, Final Fantasy's Anniversary, and more.

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:05:30 - Housekeeping
Yesterday Greg, Bless, Andrea, and I were in the reveal trailer for Tiny Tina’s Wonderlands endgame mode called Chaos Chamber – which you can see at kindafunny.com/tinytina – but today, Greg’s on the Wondercast at 11 am PT on twitch.tv/gearboxofficial!
After this Mike is playing BOTW for the first time ever raising money for Project Hope benefiting Ukraine. https://kindafunny.com/ukraine
Thank you to our Patreon Producers:
The Roper Report   -
00:06:25 - Gotham Knights Is Coming October 25th https://twitter.com/gothamknights/status/1501558438681317380?s=21
00:16:25 - Trio of Activision Blizzard shareholders reportedly under investigation - Marie Dealessandri @ Game Industry dot Biz https://www.gamesindustry.biz/articles/2022-03-09-activision-blizzard-shareholders-reportedly-under-investigation
00:21:20 - New Final Fantasy 35th Anniversary Website Celebrates Series History, Teases Info On Upcoming Titles - Wesley Leblanc @ Game Informer https://www.gameinformer.com/2022/03/09/new-final-fantasy-35th-anniversary-website-celebrates-series-history-teases-info-on
00:27:30 - Advance Ways 1 + 2: Re-Boot Camp is delayed https://mobile.twitter.com/NintendoAmerica/status/1501559021848965120
00:33:00 -  Ad
00:37:00 - F-Zero Is Coming to the Nintendo Switch https://twitter.com/NintendoAmerica/status/1501363348469866498
00:47:00 - This month’s Xbox Updates https://news.xbox.com/en-us/2022/03/09/march-2022-xbox-update/
00:50:00 - Out today
00:53:00 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts:Greg and Samoa Joe

content:encoded:
Janet and Tim join forces to talk about Gotham Knights, Final Fantasy's Anniversary, and more.


Time Stamps -

00:00:00 - Start

00:05:30 - Housekeeping

Yesterday Greg, Bless, Andrea, and I were in the reveal trailer for Tiny Tina’s Wonderlands endgame mode called Chaos Chamber – which you can see at kindafunny.com/tinytina – but today, Greg’s on the Wondercast at 11 am PT on twitch.tv/gearboxofficial!

After this Mike is playing BOTW for the first time ever raising money for Project Hope benefiting Ukraine. https://kindafunny.com/ukraine

Thank you to our Patreon Producers:

The Roper Report -

00:06:25 - Gotham Knights Is Coming October 25th https://twitter.com/gothamknights/status/1501558438681317380?s=21

00:16:25 - Trio of Activision Blizzard shareholders reportedly under investigation - Marie Dealessandri @ Game Industry dot Biz https://www.gamesindustry.biz/articles/2022-03-09-activision-blizzard-shareholders-reportedly-under-investigation

00:21:20 - New Final Fantasy 35th Anniversary Website Celebrates Series History, Teases Info On Upcoming Titles - Wesley Leblanc @ Game Informer https://www.gameinformer.com/2022/03/09/new-final-fantasy-35th-anniversary-website-celebrates-series-history-teases-info-on

00:37:00 - F-Zero Is Coming to the Nintendo Switch https://twitter.com/NintendoAmerica/status/1501363348469866498

00:47:00 - This month’s Xbox Updates https://news.xbox.com/en-us/2022/03/09/march-2022-xbox-update/
